channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Clare Balding presents live coverage of the ladies' singles final at Wimbledon, with the last two players standing battling it out for one of most prestigious titles in tennis. The Czech Republic's Barbora Krejcikova won the 2024 final, defeating Italy's Jasmine Paolini in three sets to claim her maiden Wimbledon victory and second overall in a Grand Slam singles tournament. Martina Navratilova lifted the Venus Rosewater Dish a record nine times.
